data.text:
Les entrepreneurs tunisiens intéressés par le marché algérien !


Lors de mon passage à l'événement Smau organiser à Milan - Italy

J'ai eu le plaisir de rencontrer des vingtaines d'entrepreneurs ambitieux, des investisseurs et des VC's, et avoir une idée sur l'écosystème italien qui est en plein mouvement et croissance.

J'ai eu aussi l'occasion de rencontrer nos voisins marocains et tunisiens.

Plusieurs entrepreneurs tunisiens m'ont informé qu'ils veulent pénétrer le marché algérien, dont Mohamed khedher qui a un projet ambitieux et intéressant à la fois.

Ils m'ont tous posé la même question : est-ce que les startups tunisiennes peuvent être financées en Algérie ?

Algerian Startup Fund une opportunité pour les entrepreneurs tunisiens ? est ce que c'est faisable ?

Ps : j'ai profité de faire la promotion de notre pays ainsi que notre écosystème, et de matcher des founders algériens avec d'autres founders pour des collaborations.

Ps2 : Je vais commencer à faire du sport la semaine prochaine, je dis ça depuis une année :)

highlightedComments:
I recently made the decision to transition from using the term "All in one" to employing the word "comprehensive" in describing our platform. Regrettably, the term "all-in-one" has become more of a trend than a representation of its true meaning – a platform that seamlessly integrates a broad array of features, thereby reducing friction and enhancing user experience.

The widespread utilization of these terms also, in my opinion, influenced how users perceive new brands and products. Consequently, any product labeled with these terms is often categorized automatically as a "BS" standard trendy product.

highlightedCommentsActivityCounts.text:
I recently made the decision to transition from using the term "All in one" to employing the word "comprehensive" in describing our platform. Regrettably, the term "all-in-one" has become more of a trend than a representation of its true meaning – a platform that seamlessly integrates a broad array of features, thereby reducing friction and enhancing user experience.

The widespread utilization of these terms also, in my opinion, influenced how users perceive new brands and products. Consequently, any product labeled with these terms is often categorized automatically as a "BS" standard trendy product.

data.text:
In a recent brainstorming with Ala Eddine Abid on the JTBD framework for Vndit.io, we came across the buzz word dilemma. 

Is "all-in-one" still conveying its original meaning or lost in the buzz?

The power of language lies in its ability to express ideas. "End-to-end", "seamless integration", and "AI-powered" were once authentic descriptors, not just buzz words.

In a landscape filled with impactful words, authenticity matters. While "all-in-one" might be impactful, the essence mustn't fade into the buzz. As story tellers, we hold the responsibility to communicate clearly.

Sometimes, a shift to a less bombastic term can maintain the message without the noise. It's about striking the balance between resonance and relevance.

Ultimately, it's not just about what's trending, but what truly defines our innovation. We'll choose words that resonate genuinely and stand the test of time.

And you, would you replace "all-in-one" by another word? Except "seamless" 😂 

#AuthenticCommunication #InnovationLanguage #StrikingBalance

highlightedComments: Bravo! Superbe article ! Il est vraiment essentiel de comprendre l'interconnexion entre la RSE, le marketing et l'accompagnement au changement pour une transformation durable et significative. Cette approche holistique mérite d'être sérieusement prise en considération!

highlightedCommentsActivityCounts.text: Bravo! Superbe article ! Il est vraiment essentiel de comprendre l'interconnexion entre la RSE, le marketing et l'accompagnement au changement pour une transformation durable et significative. Cette approche holistique mérite d'être sérieusement prise en considération!

data.text:
La Responsabilité Sociétale des Entreprises (RSE) offre aux entreprises la possibilité d'anticiper et de s'adapter à un monde en constante évolution. 
Cependant elle est souvent abordée de manière trop technique, axée sur les certifications et les labels, sans véritablement produire les résultats attendus. La RSE traditionnelle se concentre principalement sur les obligations réglementaires, sans apporter une réelle valeur ajoutée ou une contribution à la performance globale de l'entreprise
"Tu ne peux pas coller des ailes à une chenille et appeler ça un papillon. Le changement doit venir de l'intérieur !"
Il est temps de repenser la RSE de manière holistique.
Dans cette perspective, le marketing joue un rôle clé en sensibilisant les parties prenantes aux initiatives RSE et en créant une demande croissante pour des produits et services durables. L'accompagnement au changement facilite la transition vers une culture d'entreprise responsable, aidant les dirigeants et les employés à adopter de nouvelles mentalités et compétences.
En intégrant cette alliance heureuse entre RSE, marketing et accompagnement au changement, les entreprises peuvent dépasser les contraintes réglementaires et intégrer pleinement la RSE dans leur stratégie globale. Elles créent ainsi une réelle valeur ajoutée, renforcent leur réputation et contribuent activement aux défis mondiaux.
#RSE #ResponsabilitéSocialeDesEntreprises #TransformationDurable #AllianceHeureuse

Moharram & Partners | Public Affairs and Strategic Communications (M&P) - #corporate #announcement 

We’re absoutely delighted and honored to welcome on board the renowned public policy expert Khaled Koubaa as our new Chief Strategy Officer (CSO). Mr. Koubaa will be responsible for overseeing M&P’s global expansion strategy including the establishment of two new permanent hubs in #Dubai and #washingtondc in 2023. 

An accomplished Public Policy and Government Relations expert, Khaled Koubaa has engaged for more than 20 years in researching, defining, delivering, and coordinating key global public policy strategies for top brands such as #Google and #Meta (formerly #facebook). He also served on the board of international institutions such as ICANN, @ISOC, @AfriNIC, and is a member of the #Internet #Governance Forum (IGF) multi-stakeholder Advisory Group. Mr. Koubaa was also on the Advisory Council of the Public Interest Registry and the World Bank Group Council on #civicengagement. 

محرم وشركاه تُعين خالد قوبعة في منصب الرئيس التنفيذي للاستراتيجية للإشراف على إطلاق مكاتبها الدائمة في دبي وواشنطن خلال ٢٠٢٣. 


Check out media coverage here: https://lnkd.in/dxhMVgUc


#WeDeliver #Premium #Unrivaled #PublicPolicy #GovernmentAffairs #Stratcom #MiddleEast #Africa

data.text:
Working as part of the AMET Public Policy team at Meta has been an incredible journey, but a fantastic opportunity recently came up that I have accepted. I am incredibly thankful to all my colleagues at Meta for their collaboration on exciting policy initiatives over these last four years.
I’m excited to announce that I have accepted a new position as Chief Strategy Officer at Moharram & Partners | Public Affairs and Strategic Communications (M&P). I can’t wait to start this new adventure working alongside some great minds.

#Yoteqi #TheFutureOfNetworking #sustainability

data.text:
Super proud to announce that we won last week, the first prize after pitching during the POESAM organized by Orange at The Dot.

POESAM wasn't just a competition, it was a journey that i shared with 5 other amazing startups & friends, an amazing organizing team & top-notch mentors.

And behind every successful organization or competition, a woman dedicating all her time & energy to making POESAM a true success or even a LEGACY. Thank you Maya Jerbi for everything.

But wait, there's no Yoteqi without the team behind it that's why i  would like to dedicate this victory and thank the whole Yoteqi team for their hard work and commitment. They turned Yoteqi from an idea on a piece of paper to a viable product; transforming the way people network and engage with each other.
And I'm grateful to have an amazing mentor Jalel Ben Romdhane who was by my side for the last 12 months.

#Yoteqi #thefutureofnetworking #sustainability #POESAM2022
Jalel Ben Romdhane Nassef Otay Tabai Ala Eddin Ahmed Welhezi Zayneb Ben Aballah oussema hidri 1KUB, l'Incubateur

data.text:
We live in a world where groceries are available in 10 mins, but ambulances take up to 3 hours.

Where porn is free, but a university education costs lifelong debt.

Where NFTs generate $23 billion in volume, while governments struggle to cover $19 billion in energy price rises.

We live in a world where entrepreneurs systematically build "What People Want" - radically improving efficiency for things that cave to our base desires; while repeatedly neglecting “What People Need” - the things that empower us to be better versions of ourselves.

More than ever, we need to channel what we learned from the best of capitalist excess - supply chain efficiency, tokenized incentives, personalization at scale - towards social good. 

Some vectors are obvious, from climate tech to sustainable food supplies; some are less, from tradable tax instruments to purposeful social platforms. 

Each will require us to detach from the VC/startup zeitgeist, and push ourselves to move from product-market fit to product-society fit. It's time to build.

P.S. Considering launching a private community of impact entrepreneurs, investors, builders and creators who share this vision. You don't need to have started something, but should have skills accumulated in engineering/product/finance/strategy/ops etc. that you hope to channel towards socially impactful causes. DM or comment if interested.

#startup #tech #socialimpact

resharedPost.text:
As we prepare to celebrate the end of 2021, here is #Africa's innovation ecosystem's in numbers, according to Briter upcoming annual #investment report:

💰 $4.9+ billion in known funding - about 2x since 2020. This figure combines disclosed transactions and dozens of non-publicly rounds made available to Briter by over 60 investors for the purpose of this annual publication.
🗞 $4.65 billion in disclosed investments. This figure includes massive deals such as Tala, Zepz, Zipline, whose operations extend to a few emerging markets beyond #Africa, for a value of about $700 million.
🧮 740+ deals were announced, more than 25% compared to 2020. Out of these, about 500 were disclosed, but another ca. 35% of deals remain undisclosed. Estimates can be drawn based on the companies that have raised and their funding stage, but the total figure is unclear.
🐳 The M&A market was more vibrant than ever, with over 30 known acquisitions, 88% of which though are undisclosed. These include sizeable companies such as Capricorn Digital Limited, Connect Ads, and Parcelninja. Compared to 2020, where M&As accounted for about half of the total known investment, 2021 saw higher activity but a smaller role of M&A in the total value.
💳 #Fintech remains the leading sector, with over two thirds of total investments, with the largest deals including Wave Mobile Money, Flutterwave, TymeBank, Chipper Cash, and MFS Africa. The only other sectors with comparable deal sizes are #cleantech and #logistics.
🌍 #Nigeria, #Kenya, #SouthAfrica, and #Egypt lead as key African markets, although this year saw a sharp growth in deals across #FrancophoneAfrica and 'Tier-2' markets, such as #Ghana, #Tanzania, #Uganda, #Ethiopia, especially as companies scale and expand to neighbouring countries.
🌈 An assessment of about a decade of deals shows that all female-founded teams account for a mere 3% of total funding raised. In October, we launched a report with The World Bank on the subject.
🏢 Corporate venture and innovation are becoming mainstream across Africa, with several giants such as Google for Startups launching new funds. Several corporates are making a difference in sectors such as financial technology and renewables. Nedbank, Standard Bank Group, Absa Group, African Export-Import Bank (Afreximbank), SoftBank Group Corp. but also TotalEnergies, Mitsubishi Corporation, Toyota Tsusho Group.
💸 At least $1 billion in new #Africa-focused funds were announced in 2021. Dry powder is abundant but competition is getting high and cheap money coming from rich overseas funds may be challenging for local investors (but also an opportunity to enter early and strategically).
🐘 Mega deals, above $100 million, are being normalised, as international investors flock to the continent. Out of 2021's Top-20 deals, 60%+ of investors were from the United States and the UK.

🏎 Much, much, much more in our report. Sign up to receive it upon release, and here's a teaser: briterbridges.com/reports!

data.text: Very interesting Report by Briter

straightlabs gewinnt den eLearning Award 2021 in der Kategorie Virtual Reality. 

Gemeinsam mit der Allianz Versicherungs AG entstand das Projekt für ein virtuelles Soft Skill-Training. Durch die authentischen virtuellen Umgebungen sowie den Einsatz von fotorealistischen Avataren wird das Gefühl der Immersion perfekt. 
So sichern Unternehmen ihren Erfolg im 21. Jahrhundert. 

#straightlabs #allianz #elearning #virtualreality #vr #technologies #digitalisierung #gamification #digitallearning

data.text:
I am proud to announce that we (straightlabs GmbH & Co. KG) have won the #eLearning #Award (category: #virtualreality) for the second year in a row. 

Together with the Allianz Versicherungs-AG, we have developed one of the most advanced immersive #training programs that applies #gamification principles to the learning process and allows trainees to experience realistic training situations by interacting with photorealistic #avatars. 

It’s not just training. It’s an #experience.

We aim to help companies to secure and enhance the #business #success in the 21st century.

#corporatelearning #corporatetraining #vr #immersivetechnology #allianz #straightlabs #str8labs #successtory #innovation #personalentwicklung #newlearning #virtualtraining #extendedreality #xr

data.text:
2 678€ de budget publicitaire
596 prospects qualifiés collectés
48 ventes générées
150 492€ de chiffre d’affaires réalisé

Le tout sur le premier mois de lancement.
Ce sont les résultats que mon client a obtenus.

Et les ventes continuent à être au rendez-vous…
… plus d’un an après ce lancement.

Dans quel domaine mon client opère ?
Dans la formation. 

Obtenir des résultats prévisibles comme ceux que vous voyez maintenant n'est jamais le fruit de tactiques, de magie ou de stratégies sorties telles quelles d’un livre ou d’une vidéo Youtube.

C'est le résultat d'une stratégie bien rodée.
Aucune part à la chance ou encore pire au hasard.

Je partage les coulisses qui m’ont permis d’obtenir ces résultats avec ce client.

Je vous dévoile tout dans le détail.
Tout ce que j’ai mis en place. 
Tous les tests que j’ai menés.
Tout ce qui a fonctionné et tout ce qui a échoué.

C’est l’étude de cas la plus complète que je n’avais encore jamais écrite.

Vous pourrez recopier l’intégralité de cette stratégie pour votre propre activité.

Pourquoi je fais cela ?
Car l’expertise ne réside pas QUE dans la vente mais aussi dans l’exécution.

Commentez pour obtenir l'étude de cas
IMPORTANT: pensez à vous connecter à mon profil pour que je puisse vous envoyer l'étude de cas ;)

data.text:
UPDATE: For anybody who hasn't received the link
https://bit.ly/2RK56Se

Evaluating Board Performance - A Guide for Early Stage Companies

Here’s the typical path to building a startup’s board: every time they raise money, they add someone from the firm leading the round as a director.

That’s all fine, early stage companies rarely require company boards to perform an annual self-assessment of their performance, such as well established corporate governance guidelines.

Here is a great template on evaluating the board’s performance on more than 30 topics in the following categories:
🔹 Structure and Culture of the Board
🔹 Board Meeting Mechanics
🔹 Evaluating, Compensating and Working with Management
🔹 Oversight of the Company's Financial Condition
🔹 Board Committee Assessment
🔹 Director Self-Evaluation

Use it to bring a new best practice in board governance.

Pro-tip: When forming a company’s board, diversity is an easy idea to get behind. A recent PwC survey of corporate board members found that 94% said diversity brings unique perspectives to boards, and 84% said diversity enhances board performance.

Want access to the editable file? 

Leave a comment below and I'll send it over ASAP 👇


#startups #founders #CEO #Investors #board #performance

Credit to: Seraf Investor
